map.world_of_echoes.name: World of Echoes
map.world_of_echoes.description: A land of ancient magic and forgotten technology, the World of Echoes is a realm where echoes of the past resonate with every step. Filled with enigmatic ruins, perilous dungeons, and landscapes that shift with the whispers of bygone eras, adventurers are compelled to uncover hidden legacies and battle the remnants of a fractured world.
map.world_of_echoes.rooms.entrance.name: Whispering Gate
map.world_of_echoes.rooms.entrance.descr: The ancient stone archway known as the Whispering Gate stands tall, with runes faintly glowing. Whispers of an old language can be heard, enticing travelers to step through and begin their journey into the unknown.
map.world_of_echoes.rooms.ruined_path.de: Once a grand boulevard, now a crumbling path overgrown with ivy. A spectral mist limits visibility, and the air is perforated by the distant clangs of what could be ancient machinery or perhaps something more sinister.
A plaza with a large, dried-up fountain at its center. Echoes of the past linger as moving shadows, and the air seems to vibrate with the weight of many endings and beginnings.
map.world_of_echoes.rooms.warped_library: A library with shelves twisted by time and magic. Books hover in the air, occasionally whispering secrets to those who listen closely, but some contain traps for the unwary soul.
map.world_of_echoes.rooms.haunted_market: A market square with abandoned stalls that sometimes vend spectral goods to specters of former citizens. The ground occasionally shakes as if the market remembers the bustle of its heyday.
